title: It’s time to free JavaScript (2024)
author: pavelai
aiHeadline: JavaScript finally breaks free from its chains, proving that even the most popular programming language needs a vacation.

title: PGlite – Embeddable Postgres
author: dsego
aiHeadline: Postgres gets a gym membership, loses weight, and becomes PGlite—now small enough to fit in your pocket, but still as opinionated as ever.

title: How elites could shape mass preferences as AI reduces persuasion costs
author: 50kIters
aiHeadline: Elites are getting smarter, using AI to make persuasion as easy as ordering pizza—just add a click and you're convinced.

title: Why are 38 percent of Stanford students saying they're disabled?
author: delichon
aiHeadline: Stanford students are 38% more likely to say they're disabled, proving that even the smartest kids can be a bit lazy.

title: Unreal Tournament 2004 is back
author: keithoffer
aiHeadline: Unreal Tournament 2004 returns, proving that some things never get old—except your memory of how good you used to be.
